website_summaries.verdict: A mop with a jointed-handle that makes it easy to clean under furniture or swipe the woodwork clean.
pros: Mop is a good compact size, but not too small
Duster made to swivel into tight corners
Easy to clean the mop head
Microfiber allows you to clean your floors without chemicals
cons: The microfiber attracts dust, but may not pick up some larger pieces on your floor

customer_reviews.title: My second one... My first one lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: My second one...My first one lasted along time..I am kind of neat freak and use it twice a day...I wash it every two days in the wash machine and it holds up very well
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: The duster won't lay flat and keeps flipping up on the edge so nothing is touching the floor but the small edge of the material. It doesn't move smoothly across the floor. I had to keep struggling to try to get it to lay flat and it would only move a few inches before flipping up on the edge again. This is totally worthless. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnee Day

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I recently had wood laminate flooring installed in about one half of my home. I bought a Bona floor care system for it, but the Bona mop won't go all the way under my furniture, so I bought this Bissell duster for those hard to reach places and it does a fine job. It folds easily and ergonomically to dust under any furniture with a clearance of I'd say an inch and a half or two inches. I take it outside and shake it out after I use it, and when it gets really dirty I'll throw it in the washer. I'm very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gulf16

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: This mop works better than I bought one before, but its its flimsy when extended for bending, the fibers come out of the mop, I did not wash it yet, and I am afraid to do it in my washing machine--I think it will loose so many fibers and clog my machine - I am not sure if I will keep it, its very fussy now, the product of the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Fish

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use only thing that would make ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use only thing that would make it better is if I didn't have to do it ha,ha
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne A. Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use and shake out. I have been able to easily remove the pads and wash them by hand. The best thing for me, though, is the jointed handle. I have back problems and bending to clean under furniture hurts my back, but with the jointed handle, I can now accomplish this task easily. It takes a little getting used to but I think you'll love it too. I also love the way the ends of the mop can bend to allow you to dust the baseboards.
customer_reviews.author: DSK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Really like this, it is easy to use and after buying a 2pack replacement heads, I can easily sweep up daily. It can be a bit tricky putting the sweeper head back on, but after some practice you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: TaireeTx

customer_reviews.title: Mop
customer_reviews.text: Cat hair comes up and clings so good to this mop, when I shake it out, every bit comes off. I love this product and highly recommend it, especially to cat or dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy Dog hair removal
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my sister who has a house full of bare floors, and a dog. She can do all of the floors in less than 5 minutes, including under furniture. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart the first time I used it. The seller did give me full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy as I'd hoped to be with it.
customer_reviews.text: It works. I'm not happy with how easily the handle comes away from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Picks up great and stays attached until shaken off. Love it. Hope the plastic part lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It works easily
customer_reviews.text: it does what I needed it for. All my floors are tile and the mop works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: keb

customer_reviews.title: The handle moves to much
customer_reviews.text: I don't like, and I will not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Harper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works for me
customer_reviews.text: Best basic dust mop! Just what I was looking for! It is also easy to collapse down to a small size for storing in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: cmedlin11

customer_reviews.title: ... just got new flooring installed - this thing is excellent! My wife actually uses it and she hates ...
customer_reviews.text: We just got new flooring installed - this thing is excellent! My wife actually uses it and she hates cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RyanJ

customer_reviews.title: A Good Solid Duster
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and easy to use. It arrived in good time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad, easily sweeps floor for a quick dog hair pick up, great on our hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Cancino

customer_reviews.title: It’s light weight
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was about 6 inches longer on each side. I thought the one I thought I order was totally different, but not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rinker

customer_reviews.title: Picks up dirt very well, but...
customer_reviews.text: The handle flips all around when you are trying to sweep lol
customer_reviews.author: AmyY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. That is why I ordered it. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Don J. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use....
customer_reviews.text: This mop keeps flipping when trying to use it. Some of the fibers come off and it is very frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: LIZZ

customer_reviews.title: It's not very users friendly
customer_reviews.text: My toddler broke it in a few days. It's hard too use because of the handle bending in the middle. I thought I would love it but I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this product, Had bought it at Kohls many years ago and couldn't find it any more. Glad It was on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Makes sweeping and cleaning much easier! Covers a lot of area at once and glides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sanders

customer_reviews.title: not a good mop
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the dust mop because its so like till it turns over on the wrong side
customer_reviews.author: eunice houston

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Pease don't buy this! The mop head does no fit securely it falls right off! It is not what it says am returning the same day!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use and grab dust from hard reach area
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after some research. It is very easy to use and grab dust from hard reach area.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I’d like. I have tile through out my home. Unfortunately, it keeps folding from Handel.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love the thought of it
customer_reviews.text: I love this item - however the sturdiness could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Natanisha Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bissell Floor Duster
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bissell Floor Duster. I have been thinking about get one for a couple of years - don't know why I waited so long. It works great on my wood vinyl floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Myers

customer_reviews.title: Ok job
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and hardwood floors all downstairs. I still have to sweep before I use this, but it does a good job getting up the hair that was left behind by the broom. I am a clean freak so I mop my floors 2x/week and sweep every other day. I wish it would pick up more and hold it in. As long as I don't pick up the broom it's fine but if I have to pick it up everything just falls out.
customer_reviews.author: MandyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This mop is great for getting under furniture
customer_reviews.text: This mop is great for getting under furniture! I have several cabinets, dressers, etc. with short legs or small recesses. This does the job nicely, without strain to my lower back. I love that feature! I didn't give it 5 stars because I haven't washed it yet, and worry about that outcome. Also the rubberized ends of the base don't keep their shape, and the cover wants to work off.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kay

customer_reviews.title: I love this dry mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry mop. It is super fluffy around the edges and protects my baseboards. The rubber ends bend nicely to dust the baseboards. The diameter of the mop head cleans a larger are of floor space. I also like that it can be machine washed and dried. Remember not to use fabric softener and dry on low heat. (or air dry and fluff in the dryer)
customer_reviews.author: IfixuriMD

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wide area coverage and easily gets under anything. The last one had a pole that bent. I owned it for a few months before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Chris 0214

customer_reviews.title: It picks it all up, even sand
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for this soft, flexible dust mop a long time. There is no comparison to others. I live in sand, with little dogs. This mop gets the sand, dog hair, and everything! Afterward, a shake outside till next time. Every so often I toss it in cold water wash and air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Princess

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and very easy to use. It can go under the furniture and can do a good job keeping the dust off of baseboards. I have 3 cats and it was hard to clean up, the fur would fly around the room and hid away for a few minutes. Now I get it all up without flying fur in the rooms. I love it. 5 stars from me. I love that the duster can be taken off and washed. I haven't tried that yet. It shakes out good and it's still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning ceiling fans. Don't stand underneath with your mouth open though.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Henderson

customer_reviews.title: R-a-g-g m-o-p-p Rag Mop Doodle Dee Doo Dee Wap Wap!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dust mope but a kind of dinky material for the duster itself. Not a problem, I'll still sweep my blues away!
customer_reviews.author: Pat R. Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Best dust mop ever
customer_reviews.text: Best dust mop ever! It goes anywhere, and I washed it and it came out beautiful. Wide sweep and fast to pick up, if it goes, I will buy again. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get's the woodwork too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Not only does it dust the floor, but it also is flexible so you can get the woodwork too. I highly recommend this product. Oh, the dust mop head is easily removed to wash and have ready for next use.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Easy, flexible, good pickup
customer_reviews.text: I've had lots of dry mops in more than 40 years of housekeeping. This one is the best! So flexible that it reaches easily and gently under/around furniture legs and picks up so much little stuff as well as dust.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: It picks up very well - Great for dog hair and works better than a broom. Also, picks up better in the corners than a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rackley

customer_reviews.title: Useless product.
customer_reviews.text: Useless product. We used only for a day and it doesn’t has durability or strength to hold while mopping on floor it has no strength at all. A new addition my kids play toy.
customer_reviews.author: Imran M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my mop. I am able to easily get into corners, under beds etc., without spreading dust all over. Dust clings to the mop. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Margit Price

customer_reviews.title: ... of the silicone pieces broke) on my old duster like this. I used it to death obviously
customer_reviews.text: The mop head broke (one of the silicone pieces broke) on my old duster like this. I used it to death obviously, so I ordered a new one. I really like the flexibility and effectiveness of this duster. The plush mop part washes up nicely also.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Knappen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The broom is just what I wanted. It's light weight and does a great job of sweeping up our hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good duster
customer_reviews.text: It's very good for picking up dust and particles on floor, it beats using the vacuum and swivels easy.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well while not using the bending joint. The mop bends backwards, and flips under furniture,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Doesn’t kill your back like a regular mop. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Breeze to use and no additional expenses
customer_reviews.text: Love how it glides under my furniture. I have a bad back and this makes it so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Replaced one that I had for years and broke. Cleans great.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce P.

customer_reviews.title: Great sweep
customer_reviews.text: Does a fine job on my hardwood floors, actually puts my vacuum to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Dendraspis

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: Loves this broom for my wood floors in my studio apt.. Makes cleaning so easy
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: perfect for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect to dusting hardwood floors big enough to make quick work of an area but not industrial size so that I can not store it in a closet at home.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for light use but not anything else.
customer_reviews.author: hog1903

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Came with pad crumpled and barely works. Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is super soft and catches all the dust
customer_reviews.text: This makes dusting under my couches MUCH easier. I also use it every night to fish my baby's toys from under the couch - without having to move the couch. It is super soft and catches all the dust!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great dust mop! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Great dust mop for my wooden floors
customer_reviews.author: Marla Sanderholm

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Just a little smaller than I expected. Other than that an overall good product. I like the flexibility
customer_reviews.author: Ms M 222

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is suppose to do, get rid of the dust on your floor.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little dust mop ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little dust mop ever made. It runs circles around those little electric vacs and other mops.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Ciokiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful dust mop. Soft and gets the job done. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a duster but hard to use around furniture
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. I used it with a homemade dust mop treatment, and yes, the mop head cover did pick up dust. But this is the flimsiest mop I've ever used. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: BAD DESIGN - DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: This item does not comply with the description (and reason for purchasing) of being designed to have the ability to adjust the handle to varying angles for ease of getting beneath furniture, etc.. There is no means of locking the desired angle and therefore, the mop flails about with no control and/or drops to the 90 degree position, still unable to control the mop! I do like the fact that it is very lightweight; but other than that, it is no better than any other dust mop for less money and the "jointed handle" is useless.. This is a poor investment for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Que

product_meta.title: BISSELL Smart Details Lightweight Tile, wood floor and Hard Surfaces Microfiber Dust mop, 1763, Green
product_meta.description: Style Name:Hard Surface Dust MopBISSELL has learned that consumers are always looking for better cleaning, easier-to-use tools and multi-functional products that are compelling and offer value and efficient storage. Meet the BISSELL approach to everyday cleaning tools. SMART DETAILS products offer "wow" features that make every task easier - collapsible handles for easy storage, jointed handles to reach under furniture, soft touch grips and circular ends for hanging. From versatile brooms, dusters and a multi-functional mop to sturdy brush wares, it's function and fun for a better clean. As the name implies, the difference is in the details. This line delivers effective results and less-effort cleaning - with all the details that consumers want. And it comes from BISSELL, a name consumer's trust in Floor care.
feature_bullets: Jointed handle allows easy cleaning under furniture
Bendable edges to clean baseboards and floors in one swipe
Wide duster swivels to reach tight spaces and corners
Washable microfiber attracts dust and dirt without chemicals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars234 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
